name: Zombie Highway: Road to Safety
description:
/!\ Reload the page if the game is not running smoothly, it was made using pygame and pygbag and does not always run flawlessly /!\

This game was made for the jam 1-Button Jam 2022 in less than a week, it was a blast !

I made most of the assests for the game using
https://openai.com/dall-e-2/
https://giventofly.github.io/pixelit/#tryit

I also used assets from
https://tubelesshalo.itch.io/free-music-loop-pack
https://711studios.itch.io/15-pixel-art-textures
https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

Even the name was made with
https://beta.openai.com/playground
